{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the provided documents, it is mentioned that distinguishing COVID-19 clinically from other respiratory illnesses, including influenza, can be challenging. Document [5] also mentions that clinical manifestations and symptoms of COVID-19 and influenza can be similar, with cough and fever being common in both.
